title: [Atoll, Obsidian Pathway]
description: Obsidian stepping stones zig and zag along in a haphazard version of a path, some joined together by an even darker substance of unknown origins.  At the water's edge, a sun-bleached piece of driftwood rests next to shards of salt-stained, shattered obsidian.  A break in the copse of dark trees lining the inner atoll allows a view of the shimmering center point.

Obsidian stepping stones zig and zag along in a haphazard version of a path, with some joined together by an even darker substance, and a break in the copse of dark trees allows a view of the shimmering center point of the atoll.  A sun-bleached piece of driftwood rests against the shoreline.
